description: I believe in the power of accessible education, and I'm pleased to be putting my skills to good use at this online learning platform. I'm working to launch a new product and improve legacy code, on a Rails and React stack.

At this reknowned software consultancy I continued to hone my craft, applying my commitment to quality and best practise to TDD, pair programming and CI/CD. I worked on a range of full-stack technologies, including React, Java, Spring, Firebase and Vue.

I worked on an innovative new initiative to improve data configuration for a set of microservices. Working on both front and back-end development (Java and Javascript), my role involved liaising with product owners, senior engineers and external stakeholders.

At this leading Canadian mobile games company I worked to provide the best possible experience for our users, and to connect the developers and designers with player feedback. Writing FAQs, looking at analytics and investigating bugs, I had a close understanding of our products and the opportunities and challenges of mobile development.
I worked on brand direction for this new kind of bookstore, produced marketing materials and helped to run the shop itself.
list:
• Writing copy for blogs, newsletters and social campaigns.

  • Overseeing operations and ensuring they run smoothly.

description: I worked with the Exhibitions to team to ensure the smooth running of this innovative and challenging project, an exhibition of the world’s most exciting virtual reality experiences. I am trained in the use of all major VR headsets.
list:
• Problem-solving and communicating instructions and narrative information with hundreds of visitors a day.

  • Liaising with artists to ensure installations ran correctly.

description: As part of the digital publishing team, I handled a diverse portfolio of projects across fiction and interactive narratives. I produced ebooks, apps and websites. Projects included the web-based book STRATA, a global arts and tech campaign for Stephen Fry called YourFry and the Summer of Penguin advertising campaign.
list:
• Writing copy for blogs, newsletters and social campaigns.

  • Managing content creation between authors and suppliers.

  • Copyediting and proofreading manuscripts.

  • Commissioning authors and artists.

  • Producing and overseeing video and audio production.
